mapper.insert: INSERT seminar (course_id, round_id, seminar_name, introduction, max_team, is_visible, seminar_serial, enroll_start_time, enroll_end_time) VALUE (#{seminar.course.courseId}, #{seminar.round.roundId}, #{seminar.topic}, #{seminar.introduction}, #{seminar.maxTeamNum}, #{seminar.visible}, #{seminar.signOrder}, #{seminar.signStartTime}, #{seminar.signEndTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE seminar SET course_id = #{seminar.course.courseId}, round_id = #{seminar.round.roundId}, seminar_name = #{seminar.topic}, introduction = #{seminar.introduction}, max_team = #{seminar.maxTeamNum}, is_visible = #{seminar.visible}, seminar_serial = #{seminar.signOrder}, enroll_start_time = #{seminar.signStartTime}, enroll_end_time = #{seminar.signEndTime} WHERE id = #{seminar.seminarId}
mapper.select: SELECT seminar.id as seminarId, seminar_name as topic, seminar.introduction as introduction, max_team as maxTeamNum, is_visible as visible, seminar_serial as signOrder, enroll_end_time as signEndTime, enroll_start_time as signStartTime, course.id as courseId, course_name as courseName, round_id as roundId FROM seminar, course where seminar.id = #{seminarId}
